casebody.data:
Danny D. AULD, II, and Tamara Auld, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
MCLAREN REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER, Gjon G. Dushaj, MD, and Paul W. Brown, DO, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Hatem Ataya, MD, and Hatem M. Ataya, MD, PC, Defendants. SC: 159646
COA: 341335 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellants to extend the time for filing their reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before September 24, 2019.
